footer.content: The social network made by cats, for humans.

testimonials.title: What users say
testimonials.content: The cats on the platform are very satisfied using our application.
testimonials.quote: "Meow, meow meow meow meow. Meow meow, meow meow meow meow meow meow. Meow meow meow, meow meow meow. *purrs* Meow meow meow, meow meow MEOW MEOW."

concept.title: The social network for cats
content: purr. is a unique social network specially designed for cat lovers. Here, cats become the true protagonists with their own profile.
It is a fun and safe place where the feline community can gather, explore, and connect.

unique.title: What makes purr. so special?
content: In addition to being a space for feline entertainment and expression, purr. facilitates the adoption of cats by providing detailed profiles of cats that need a home. This feature not only allows potential adopters to better know their future companions but also simplifies the process of finding a loving home for each cat. Making adoption an accessible and personal experience is one of our priorities.

Another distinctive service of purr. is our interactive maps, which allow users to easily locate veterinarians, cat cafes, pet product stores, and animal shelters in their area. This tool is invaluable for cat owners as it provides quick access to essential resources, promoting a more integrated and conscious lifestyle for the well-being of their pets.

ai.title: Exclusively feline content on purr.
content: We employ advanced artificial intelligence technology to ensure that all uploaded images and videos truly celebrate the world of cats. We use an AI model, based on PyTorch, that has been specially trained with over 10,000 cat images to accurately recognize only feline content.
This ensures that every piece of content you see has been validated by our cutting-edge technology, keeping purr. authentic and true to its feline spirit.

cta.title: Do you want to join the purr. community?
cta.content: Sign up now and start enjoying the feline experience.

underConstruction.title: The kittens are working on it!
underConstruction.content: This page is currently under construction. Come back soon to see the latest updates!

privacyPolicy.title: purr. Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: At purr., we value the privacy of our users and are committed to protecting their personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and share information about our users and their pets within our application. By using purr., you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

name.name: Name
name.description: Your name is visible to other users on the platform and is used to personalize the purr. experience.

email.name: Email
email.description: We use your email to set up and manage your account and for account security communications.

googleId.name: Google ID
googleId.description: We use your Google ID to authenticate you on purr. and to associate your Google account with your purr. account.

googleAvatar.name: Google Avatar
googleAvatar.description: If you choose to sign in with Google, we will use your Google avatar as your purr. account avatar.

traits.name: Name, breed, color, date of birth, and sex
traits.description: These details are used to create a unique profile for your cat and to help other users get to know your pet better.

adoption.name: Adoption status
adoption.description: We collect this information to help connect cats in need of a new home with potential adopters.

informationUse.title: Use of Information
informationUse.content: At purr., we primarily use the collected information to ensure the optimal functioning and continuous improvement of our application. This includes managing and maintaining the platform, personalizing the user experience, and direct communication to provide updates and relevant information. Additionally, we use this data to implement security measures that help keep the platform safe.

informationSharing.title: Sharing Your Information
informationSharing.content: At purr., we do not sell or rent our users' personal information to third parties. We may share information with third parties under the following circumstances:
list: Service providers who assist us with operational services such as web hosting and data maintenance.
If necessary to comply with a law or regulation, in response to a legal request, court order, or similar legal process, or to protect our rights or property.

privacyRights.title: Your Privacy Rights
privacyRights.content: As a purr. user, you have the right to access, correct, update, or delete your personal information at any time. If you wish to exercise these rights, please contact us at {email}.

informationSecurity.title: Information Security
informationSecurity.content: At purr., we take our users' information security very seriously. We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect our users' personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction.

policyUpdate.title: Policy Updates
policyUpdate.content: We may update our privacy policy periodically to reflect, for example, changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We advise you to review this policy periodically to stay informed about how we protect your information.

privacyPolicy.contact: If you have questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at {email}.

cookiePolicy.title: purr. Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.introduction: At purr., we value your privacy and want to ensure you understand how and why we use cookies on our platform. This cookie policy explains what cookies are, how we use them, and your options regarding their use.

whatAreCookies.title: What are cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device (computer, tablet, smartphone) when you visit a website. Cookies help the website recognize your device and remember certain information about your visits, thus improving your browsing experience.

cookiesExplain.title: How do we use cookies?
cookiesExplain.content: At purr., we use different types of cookies for different purposes. Here we explain the cookies we use and why we need them:

essential.title: Essential cookies
essential.content: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. Without them, you would not be able to use some of the basic functions of our platform.

session.name: purr_session
session.description: This cookie is used to maintain the user's session. It is essential for you to stay authenticated while navigating the platform.

xsrf.name: XSRF-TOKEN
xsrf.description: This cookie is used to protect against Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) attacks. It is essential for the security of your interaction with purr.

gdpr.name: gdpr_cookie_consent
gdpr.description: This cookie stores your consent for the use of cookies on our platform, ensuring we comply with data protection regulations.

necessary.title: Necessary cookies
necessary.content: These cookies are not strictly essential, but they help us provide a better user experience.

locale.name: locale
locale.description: This cookie stores the language preference of the unauthenticated user, allowing the application to display in the correct language when you revisit us.

noTracking.title: We do not use tracking cookies
noTracking.content: At purr., we do not use tracking cookies or similar technologies to monitor your online behavior. We commit to not using cookies to collect information about you for marketing or advertising purposes.

cookieManagement.title: Cookie management
cookieManagement.content: You have the option to allow or disable the use of cookies on our platform. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings. Note that disabling essential cookies may affect the functionality of the website and your user experience.

policyUpdate.title: Policy updates
policyUpdate.content: We may update this cookie policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices and services. We recommend reviewing this policy periodically to stay informed about how we use cookies.

cookiePolicy.contact: If you have any questions about our cookie policy, please contact us via our {email}.

dialog.title: WARNING! You are about to delete your account!
content: This action will result in the permanent and irreversible loss of access to your account.
Cats registered with more than one owner will not be affected. However, cats of which you are the only owner
will be permanently deleted from purr.
If you are sure you want to proceed and leave the purr. community, enter your password below. Pressing the button will permanently delete your account.

toast.success: Your account has been successfully deleted. The cats will be waiting for your return!
toast.error: There was an error deleting your account
toast.emptyPassword: Please enter your password to delete your account.

rickReference.quote: "purr. will never give you up, never let you down, never run around. purr. will never make you cry, never say goodbye, never tell a lie and hurt you."

noKittens.title: You haven't created a profile for your cat yet
content: Hello! It seems you haven't registered any cats on purr. yet. Here, each cat has its own profile so you can share their adventures and photos.
Why don't we create a profile for your cat now? It's quick and easy!

mediaInput.title: Share a feline moment
mediaInput.content: Drag or click to share content of your feline friend on purr.

mediaDashboard.noCatsDetected: No cats detected in the image
mediaDashboard.catSelectionLabel: Which cat will make the post?
mediaDashboard.captionPlaceholder: Write a description for the post

none: Feline radar: no cats in sight!
I checked twice, but didn't find any cats.
single: Looks like there's a cat around here
A lonely kitty is peeking out
We have a feline visitor here
multiple: It's a sea of pointed ears and fluffy tails!

noCatDialog.title: No cats detected in the image
content: The AI couldn't identify any cats in the post, if there is indeed a cat in the photo, don't worry! You can still upload your cat's image.
The post will be reviewed manually and approved once a cat is identified.
Please note that uploading non-feline content to purr. is against the terms and conditions of purr. and may result in a permanent ban from the platform.

starting.title: Welcome your cat to purr.!
starting.description: To start, tell us your cat's name and the catname you want to use.
starting.alreadyExists: Does your cat already belong to another owner? Add it to your collection!

form.name: Cat's name
form.catnameTooltip: The catname is a unique name that identifies your cat on purr. Be original!

traits.title: Tell us more about your cat
traits.description: Now, tell us more details about your cat. The more details you give us, the more your cat will stand out on purr.

birthdate.label: Date of birth
birthdate.description: If you don't know it, you can always put the date you got the cat.

adoption.label: The cat is up for adoption
adoption.description: By checking this box, users will be able to see that the cat is looking for a new owner and can contact you.

password.title: Protect your cat
password.description: Finally, add a password to protect your cat and be able to share it with other owners.
